translation.BannerText: Welcome to our big community. More than 50.000 eBooks to read for free.
translation.InfoBlockText: Dive into a rich assortment of genres, from gripping thrillers and heartwarming romance to mind-expanding science fiction and informative non-fiction.
translation.AcceptanceofTermsText: By accessing or using Biblio, you agree to comply with and be bound by these terms and conditions.
translation.UserAccountsText: Users may be required to create an account to access certain features of Biblio. Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account information.
translation.ContentAccessibilityText: Biblio provides access to a variety of ebooks. Users may only use the content for personal, non-commercial purposes.
translation.IntellectualPropertyText: All content on Biblio, including but not limited to text, images, and logos, is the intellectual property of Biblio or its licensors. Users may not reproduce, distribute, or modify any content without prior written consent.
translation.UsageRestrictionsText: Users agree not to engage in any activity that could harm Biblio, its users, or interfere with the proper functioning of the platform. Prohibited activities include but are not limited to hacking, data mining, and the distribution of malware.
translation.PrivacyPolicyText: Biblio respects user privacy. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and disclose information.
translation.CookiesText: Biblio may use cookies to enhance user experience. By using Biblio, you consent to the use of cookies in accordance with our Cookie Policy.
translation.TerminationofServiceText: Biblio reserves the right to terminate or suspend access to the service at any time, with or without cause.
translation.FeedbackText: Users are encouraged to provide feedback on Biblio's features and services. By submitting feedback, users grant Biblio the right to use and implement the suggestions.
translation.DisclaimersText: Biblio is provided "as is" without any warranties, expressed or implied. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or suitability of the content available on the platform.
translation.ChangestoTermsText: Biblio reserves the right to modify these terms at any time. Users will be notified of significant changes, and continued use of Biblio constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.
translation.ContactInformationText: For inquiries, users may contact Biblio through the provided contact information.
translation.InformationWeCollectText: We may collect personal information, such as name, surname, email, avatar, log data, and usage data through cookies and similar technologies.
translation.HowWeUseYourInformationText: We use the collected information to provide and improve Biblio, personalize content, analyze usage patterns, and respond to user inquiries.
translation.InformationSharingText: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share information with service providers, legal authorities, affiliates, or business partners when necessary or with your consent.
translation.SecurityMeasuresText: We take reasonable security measures to protect your information. However, please be aware that no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.
translation.YourChoicesText: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You can opt-out of marketing communications and disable cookies in your browser settings.
translation.ChildrensPrivacyText: Biblio is not intended for individuals under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.
translation.ChangestoThisPrivacyPolicyText: We may update this Privacy Policy. We will notify you of any changes by posting the updated Privacy Policy on our website. Please review this policy periodically.
translation.ContactUsText: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at office@biblio.com.
translation.PrivacyAdditional: Welcome to Biblio's Privacy Policy. This document outlines how we handle your personal information when you use our website. By using Biblio, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.
translation.Name: Name
translation.EmailConfirmSent: We have sent you a confirmation email. Please click the button in the email to activate your account.
translation.TooManyRequestsTryInThreeMinutes: Too many requests. Try in 3 minutes.
translation.YourAccIsNotVerified: Your account is not verified. Check your email or
translation.UserExistTryToRegister: User is exist. Try to register one more time.
translation.YourVerificationCodeIsInvalid: Your verification code is invalid or you have already confirmed your account.
translation.YourAccountIsSuccesfullyVerified: Your account is successfully verified. Now you can login into your account.
translation.ForgetPassTipText: After you enter your email, we will send you a password reset email allowing you to reset your password.
translation.ForgetPassIsVerifyingTipText: We have sent you a password recovery email. Please click the button in the link to recover your password.
translation.PassResetTimeExpired: Something went wrong. Your password reset link has expired.
translation.SuccessResetPass: You have successfully changed your password. Now you can login into your account.
translation.UsernameBetweenCharacters: Username must be between 3 and 20 characters
translation.PasswordBetweenCharacters: Password must be at least 6 characters long
translation.PasswordContainsDigits: Password must contain at least one digit, one lowercase and one uppercase letter, and one special character
